column5: Have been looking for some fishing shows to watch(in Brampton) cant seem to find many unless its on the weekend,anyone have any, if so could you let me know time and day? please and thanks L.A

Dave Mercer's Facts of Fishing is on Saturday and Sundays @ 9am and Sunday @ 2pm on The Score (53 here in Toronto). and on WFN its on Wednesdays @ 8pm, Saturdays @ 9:30pm & Sunday @ 9:30am.  WFN schedule is  FOUND HERE I wish I had WFN  All other shows, I'm not too sure... you'd have to check their website (most have a schedule)
Fishing with Shelly and Courtney.     I've been a member of their fan club since the mid 90's.
weekend mornings, they are on a ton of channels.  Global has a lot on there, during the week I think  you'd have to subscribe to the WFN channel.
I've had WFN since forever - 24/7 of fishing. If you're on Rogers I know you can order just that channel. It's great - and it has Mariko Izumi!
What about any links on the net of any downloaded past shows, especially Fly Fishing ones would be great. Having trouble finding any.
